main event: A yellowish-white streak of light was observed in the sky, identified as a probable meteor.
interesting points: The sighting was observed for about 5 minutes by 3 ground observers., The object had a yellowish trail and no sound or trail was left behind., It was reported by American Airlines and confirmed by the Hutchinson Tower., The object traveled at a speed of 800-1000 miles/hr., The object appeared to be 3000-4000 feet above the horizon.
sighted object: a yellowish-white streak of light in the sky
witness description: ground observers and airline flight crews
